subject: feat: reorder tab sections from most interesting to least interesting
body:
Sections within each tab were ordered structurally (stats first) rather
than by engagement. Now ordered so the most interesting content appears
first: charts/insights before stats, actionable breakdowns before trends,
per-person detail last. Also fixes TagsTab CSS order bug (parent needed
flex for order-* classes to work).

https://claude.ai/code/session_01JiBipRsvhKuoDSEpUdTucf
title: reorder tab sections from most interesting to least interesting
